biotools.summary: Perform single marker association testing on raw next generation sequencing data. It allows for flexible covariates adjustment and does not require genotype calling. Provides a likelihood ratio test (LRT), score test and a combination of the two.

bioschemas.name: UNCcombo
bioschemas.summary: Perform single marker association testing on raw next generation sequencing data. It allows for flexible covariates adjustment and does not require genotype calling. Provides a likelihood ratio test (LRT), score test and a combination of the two.
